result.reason: Issue body is empty — cannot determine reproduction steps, Windows version, DPI settings, or monitor configuration needed to diagnose why RDP appears too small after 'Send To Screen' action.
result.approach: Reproduce with 'Send To Screen' on a multi-monitor setup; likely needs RDP control resize/SmartSize recalculation after panel is moved to target screen — similar pattern to #2142 (RDP auto-resize on monitor change).
